body:
Note, this PR has dropped the new test, which was added in #7084, basically cut and paste from there:

```ruby
  test "tags are space-separated" do
    $, = "_"
    @logger.tagged("BCX", "BDX") { @logger.info "Funky time" }
    assert_equal "[BCX] [BDX] Funky time\n", @output.string
  end
```

What about reducing `tags_text` and removing `message_with_tags`... ?

```ruby

      def call(severity, timestamp, progname, log_message)
        super(severity, timestamp, progname, "#{tags_text} #{log_message}".lstrip)
      end

      def tags_text
        current_tags.collect { |tag| "[#{tag}]" }.join(' ')
      end
```

After this, tests still pass.

```shell
$ ruby -Iactivesupport/test activesupport/test/tagged_logging_test.rb 
Run options: --seed 42265

.........
```
